home.description: We are a professional tattoo studio with a panoramic view of one of the most beautiful cities. We know that every stroke tells a story, we create art pieces that last a lifetime.

cta.title: What's your next tattoo?
cta.description: Tell us your idea, the style and size, do you already have tattoos? The studio takes care of advising you and presenting the perfect artist for you.

metadata.og_description: Professional tattoo portfolio. Each piece tells a unique story. Specialists in multiple styles.

hero.title: About the Studio
hero.description_1: Founded in 2022, Studio 12 opened its doors in the San Telmo neighborhood, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, with the mission of sharing the art of tattooing from a contemporary perspective, without losing the values that define it as a craft.
hero.description_2: The studio maintains constant updating and training, with the objective of offering a service according to the expectations and needs of each client.
hero.description_3: At Studio 12 we work under high standards of hygiene, safety and professionalism. We use state-of-the-art equipment and apply strict sanitary protocols to guarantee a safe, careful and comfortable experience in each session.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the artists who bring your ideas to life. Each with their unique style and passion for the art of tattooing.

guests.title: Guest Artists
guests.description: Meet the temporary artists who collaborate with us. Each brings their unique style and perspective to the studio.

cta.title: Want to work with our team?
cta.description: Book a free consultation to discuss your idea with the artist who best fits your style.

metadata.title: About Us - Our Team of Artists
metadata.description: Meet our team of professional artists specialized in realism, traditional, minimalist, oriental and more. Founded in 2015 with the highest standards of quality and safety.
metadata.og_title: About estudio12 - Our Team of Artists
metadata.og_description: Meet our team of professional artists specialized in multiple tattoo styles. Over 10 years of combined experience.

founder.name: Macarena Troiani
founder.description: I like to encourage people to live from what they are passionate about and share what I have learned in these 11 years. I have taken seminars, workshops and training of all kinds to grow as a professional and enrich my artistic eye. I am still learning, it is a constant in my life.

martina.name: Martina Padula
martina.description: My search in tattooing is to achieve delicate and neat tattoos, with great value in details. I give them a dark aura, which is my personal brand.

ivo.name: Ivo Bardon
ivo.description: I am from San Telmo and all my work is done with dots. I dedicate myself to making pieces with a lot of symbolic charge for each client and my challenge is to create pieces with the ornamental Buenos Aires aesthetic.

sofia.name: Sofía Campanaro
sofia.description: My artistic search comes from everyday inspirations, the textures and movements that the things we see and feel have in order to reach an abstraction of that.

mateo.name: Mateo Díaz
mateo.description: I am 21 years old and my artistic search is focused on traditional Argentine culture, music and football. I am devoted to the search for meaning and purpose, and I try to immortalize symbols on the skin through realism in dialogue with minimalism and graphic design.

hero.title: Let's talk about your idea
hero.description: Fill out the form or contact us directly via WhatsApp or Instagram. We respond to all inquiries.

form.title: Send us a message
form.message_placeholder: Describe the tattoo you have in mind, preferred style, approximate size...

social.title: Follow us on social media
social.schedule: Quick WhatsApp response Mon to Sat, 10:00 - 20:00
